p: RFID technology enables information interaction or exchange without human intervention and awareness [ 11]. RFID-based systems have been used in health care environments [ 12] and the food industry [ 13, 14]. Recently, RFID chips have been embedded in plates for dietary recording [ 15, 16]. Wireless interaction between the RFID-embedded plates and RFID readers facilitates automatic collection of food consumption information with supporting dietary assessment.
